item.title: [HLP]Add Customs (PvP armor)
item.dc:creator: @js53 js53
item.description:
@js53 wrote:

Well First off, I’m using DeltaScape Server(Yeah I know)
And II Claws II’s DeltaScape Cleint.

Does anyone know what I could do to fix the error in second post?

(I’m sure you can tell what we’re trying to fix)
